description: Girk' or koch'i e"ndhanrakan [The Book Called the Encyclical ] Girk' or koch'i e"ndhanrakan [The Book Called the Encyclical ], by Kat'oghikos Nerses Shnorhali (St. Petersburg, 1788), in 373 pdf pages. File size: 44.1 MB. Also available: Tught' e"ndhanrakan Nersesi kat'ughikosi hayots' [Epistola Pastoralis S. Nersetis Clajensis]. Classical Armenian text with Latin translation by Joseph Cappelletti (Venice, 1829), in 193 pdf pages. File size: 6 MB.

is_part_of.title: Online Armenian Catalogs, Philosophical, Patristic, and Theological Materials
